articles.title: Former Australian cricket captain Karen Rolton reflects on first multi-format series against India
articles.description: The hosts may have won the inaugural Australia–India women’s series trophy, but there are plenty of talking points that emerged from the contest that are more important to the future of women's cricket.
articles.content:
Last week, the Australian women's cricket team clinched their first international series of the summer, beating India 11-5 in the inaugural multi-format series.
In a fiercely contested series, there… [+6407 chars]
